english: I, rather imprudently, wished you good-night .
chinese: 我相当冒失地祝你晚安。

english: She said good night in a broken voice .
chinese: 她在祝他晚安时嗓音哽咽。

english: My lady turned round to wish them good-night .
chinese: 夫人回身来向他们道了晚安。
晚安造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: But i see you are tired to death, and will wish you good night .
chinese: 不过我看你累得要死，还是祝你晚安吧。

english: "good evening, madam," rudolph said, impersonal, institutional .
chinese: “晚安，太太，”鲁道夫说，不事感情，公事公办。

english: "good night, you two characters." nim kissed leah and benjy .
chinese: “晚安，你们两个淘气鬼。”尼姆吻了一下莉亚和本杰。

english: With joyful shouts and friendly good nights the crowd separated .
chinese: 人群兴高采烈地欢呼着，亲切地互道晚安，接着分手了。

english: They said good night to john and walked up the king's highway toward the house .
chinese: 他们向约翰尼道了晚安，踏上金氏大道，走向住所。

english: They had come back tired and happy and said good night and gone to bed .
chinese: 回来之后，个个心满意足而又精疲力尽，匆匆道了晚安便上了床。

english: At the drab wooden house in which she lived he said good night briefly and amiably .
chinese: 到了她住的那幢黄褐色的木头房子前，他简短而友好地道了晚安。

english: She threw at me a very naughty look, so naughty that i would not kiss her good-night at first .
chinese: 她对我作出非常淘气的表情，淘气得我起先都不想吻她和道晚安了。

english: "good-night, alexandra," she called back in a strained voice, running down the gravel walk .
chinese: “晚安，亚历山德拉，”她扭回头用极不自然的声调说，顺着砾石路跑去。
